ai-tha-ap525:0.3_0: He is praised by the senior monks, who sometimes go to the junior,
ai-tha-ap525:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap525:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap525:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap525:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sarabha.
ai-tha-ap525:7.1_0: The third, the good one, the senior by going for refuge.
